name: Seattle Sports Kayak Wall Cradles
description: Even the most avid paddler has to come home sometime, if only to rinse out the smelly neoprene and restock the peanut butter and bagels. Dock your craft on the wall with these strong steel cradles.Sold in pairs.Lightweight yet strong powder-coated steel.Height is 61cm (24in), depth is 36cm (14in).Mounting lag bolts included for quick and easy installation.Fits sea kayaks or whitewater boats.
